description: Allow this user to access assistant tools

name: User-assistant_enabled

label: Show Customer Balance

label: Force Reload Items

description:
Search Limit for Items
For best performance keep this under 1500
label: Search Limit Number
name: POS Profile-posa_search_limit

label: Show Custom Name Marker On Print
name: POS Profile-posa_show_custom_name_marker_on_print
